name: Slime Time (Corey Cosmonaut)
description:
This is the first of 5 one-week prototypes I am developing.

One of these 5 prototypes will be chosen to be fully developed as a small but fully publishable game by the end of the year.

Player name has to be at least 3 characters.

Room name has to be at least 6 characters.

Controls

  • Space - Jump
  • WASD - Control Jump Direction
  • R - Respawn
  • End - Leave Room

Thumbnail made with Craiyon.
